Package at.disys

Class DataCollectionReceiver

java.lang.Object
at.disys.DataCollectionReceiver
public class DataCollectionReceiver extends Object
This class is responsible for receiving the data collection from the data collector.

Receives all collected data
Sort the data to the according gathering job
Sends data to the PDF Generator when the data is complete
